mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM event_participants WHERE eventId = #{eventId} AND status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT memberId FROM event_participants WHERE eventId = #{eventId} AND status = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT e.id as eventId, e.eventCategory, e.title, e.startDate, e.endDate, CASE WHEN w.isAnnounced = 1 THEN true ELSE false END as isAnnounced, w.ticketSentStatus, w.drawAt FROM events e LEFT JOIN (SELECT eventId, MAX(isAnnounced) as isAnnounced, MAX(ticketSentStatus) as ticketSentStatus, MAX(drawAt) as drawAt FROM winners GROUP BY eventId) w ON e.id = w.eventId WHERE w.eventId IS NOT NULL ORDER BY w.drawAt DESC

SELECT w.id as winnerId, m.name as name, m.email as email, at.advanceTicketNumber as advanceTicketNumber, at.expiresAt FROM winners w JOIN members m ON w.memberId = m.id JOIN advance_tickets at ON w.advanceTicketId = at.id WHERE w.eventId = #{eventId}
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END FROM winners WHERE eventId = #{eventId} AND isAnnounced = true
SELECT sportName FROM sports ORDER BY id
SELECT t.teamName, s.sportName FROM teams t JOIN sports s ON t.sportId = s.id ORDER BY s.sportName, t.teamName
SELECT id FROM sports WHERE sportName = #{sportName}
SELECT * FROM sports ORDER BY id
SELECT t.*, s.sportName FROM teams t JOIN sports s ON t.sportId = s.id ORDER BY s.sportName, t.teamName
SELECT v.*, s.sportName, t.teamName FROM venues v JOIN sports s ON v.sportId = s.id JOIN teams t ON v.teamId = t.id ORDER BY s.sportName, t.teamName, v.venueName
SELECT id FROM teams WHERE teamName = #{teamName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO advance_tickets (adminId, advanceTicketNumber, used, expiresAt, issuedAt) VALUES (#{adminId}, #{advanceTicketNumber}, #{used}, #{expiresAt}, #{issuedAt})

INSERT INTO events (adminId, eventCategory, title, content, thumbnail, startDate, endDate, status) VALUES (#{adminId}, #{eventCategory}, #{title}, #{content}, #{thumbnail}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status})
INSERT INTO winners (eventId, memberId, advanceTicketId) VALUES (#{eventId}, #{memberId}, #{advanceTicketId})
INSERT INTO winner_posts (eventId, adminId, title, content) VALUES (#{eventId}, #{adminId}, #{title}, #{content})
INSERT INTO teams (sportId, teamName, shortName) VALUES (#{sportId}, #{teamName}, #{shortName})
INSERT INTO venues (sportId, teamId, venueName, address, capacity) VALUES (#{sportId}, #{teamId}, #{venueName}, #{address}, #{capacity})
mapper.update: UPDATE events SET title = #{title}, eventCategory = #{eventCategory}, content = #{content}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, status = #{status}, updatedAt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE winners SET emailSentAt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, ticketSentStatus = 'SENT' WHERE id = #{winnerId}
